title: Sen. Kamala Harris | With Less than 100 Days Until the Election, Trump and the GOP Are Desperate: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the morally and intellectually bankrupt Republican party squabbling over cutting unemployment benefits, sending secret police into American cities and whining about cartoons.

Then, he speaks to Senator Kamala Harris.
